privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Privacy Policy for ANKH Platform
privacy.intro: This privacy policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") represents the general framework and organizational principles governing how the management, employees, and contractors of ANKH Platform handle the provision of services through the electronic platform, in the context of operating and managing the platform's website. Given that the platform relies on user interactions and the submission of various data and information, some of this data may be personal in nature, while other information is publicly available. All such data is collectively referred to as "User Data".

scope.title: 1. Scope of This Policy
scope.content: This Policy aims to clarify the internal rules and guidelines adopted by ANKH Platform in handling User Data, and is shared with administrators, employees, service providers, and partners to define acceptable and unacceptable conduct when collecting, using, or sharing such data. The Policy also aims to inform users about how technical systems within the platform that store or process User Data are managed, noting that some services or interactions may occur through independent third parties that may have their own privacy policies. This Policy is not a legally binding contract, nor does it constitute an explicit or implicit commitment or guarantee from the platform toward users or any official or unofficial entity; rather, it is a guiding organizational framework.

management.title: 2. Policy Management and Compliance
management.content: ANKH Platform retains the full right and authority to assess compliance with this Policy within its organizational structure and to take appropriate measures in case of violations, whether internal or organizational. The platform also reserves the right to determine whether the results of such measures are treated as confidential information or disclosed.

dataCollection.title: 3. Collection and Use of User Data
dataCollection.content: User Data is collected to enable the platform to provide its services optimally. This data includes, but is not limited to, information that helps verify the user's identity and legal eligibility, such as age data, login credentials including username and password, and communication methods such as email and phone number. The data may also include information necessary to complete transactions or provide services, such as preferred payment method or postal/geographic address. User Data typically does not include analytical or inferential data that may be derived later based on platform usage or through data analysis tools. ANKH Platform is committed to applying applicable laws and regulations regarding the protection and processing of personal data, and User Data is handled through secure electronic systems with access restricted within the work environment according to the principle of functional need only.

dataSharing.title: 4. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: The platform may, when necessary, share some User Data with partners, service providers, or affiliated entities, within the limits that serve the provision of services or compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.

dataProtection.title: 5. Data Protection
dataProtection.content: ANKH Platform is committed to following recognized standards in data protection and information security. Although no means can guarantee complete security when transmitting or storing data over the internet, the platform continuously works to apply the best reasonable technical and commercial practices to reduce risks and protect user privacy.

dataAsAsset.title: 6. Data as a Business Asset
dataAsAsset.content: User Data is considered one of the essential assets in digital business. In the event that ANKH Platform undergoes any organizational or commercial operations such as mergers, acquisitions, or restructuring, this data may be part of the valuation or transition, with the platform committed to ensuring that User Data continues to be handled with the same level of protection and privacy by any legal successor.

userRights.title: 7. User Rights
userRights.content: Users have the right to request modification or updating of their data registered with the platform, provided that this is within a legal framework and does not result in any circumvention or misuse of the service, and without demanding complete account deletion if it conflicts with regulatory obligations. The platform will handle such requests as it deems appropriate and in accordance with sound commercial and organizational considerations.

amendments.title: 8. Policy Amendments
amendments.content: This Policy was adopted and became effective as of December 2022 and is available for review by relevant parties. ANKH Platform reserves its full right to modify or update this Policy at any time without prior notice, so it is recommended to review it periodically.

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Terms and Conditions of Use for ANKH Platform
terms.intro: Welcome to ANKH Platform. By using this platform, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using ANKH Platform, registering on it, or accessing any of its services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please do not use the platform.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: ANKH Platform provides electronic educational and training services designed for organizations and institutions, including video training courses, PDF educational materials, interactive quizzes, and completion certificates. The platform also offers the ability to book in-person (offline) training courses.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: Using the platform requires creating an account for the organization. Users must provide accurate and correct information during registration and maintain the confidentiality of login credentials. All new accounts are subject to administrative approval before activation. Users bear full responsibility for any activity conducted through their accounts.

subscriptions.title: 4. Subscriptions and Payments
subscriptions.content: Access to platform content is available through subscription plans (monthly or yearly). Subscriptions are activated after uploading a payment receipt and obtaining administrative approval. Subscription fees are non-refundable after approval. The platform reserves the right to modify subscription prices with prior notice.

obligations.title: 5. User Obligations
obligations.content: Users agree not to share platform content with unauthorized parties, not to attempt unauthorized access to platform systems, and not to use the platform for illegal or unlawful purposes. Any violation of these obligations may result in account suspension or termination.

intellectualProperty.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content provided through the platform, including training courses, videos, PDF files, quizzes, designs, and trademarks, are the property of ANKH Platform or licensed to it. Copying, distributing, or reproducing any content without prior written permission from the platform is prohibited.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: The platform provides its services "as is" without any express or implied warranties. ANKH Platform shall not be liable for any direct or indirect damages resulting from the use of the platform or the inability to use it, including loss of data or profits.

law.title: 8. Governing Law
law.content: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt. In the event of any dispute related to the use of the platform, the competent Egyptian courts shall be the body responsible for adjudication. ANKH Platform reserves the right to modify these terms at any time, and users will be notified of material changes.

not_found.title: Page Not Found
not_found.description: The link you're looking for may have changed or is no longer available. Return to ANKH gateway or explore our learning paths.
not_found.tagline: Gateway to Knowledge, Start of the Journey
